item.description:
HI Everybody,

Bring your laptop and let's get together and enjoy the coffee, desserts, and free wireless at The Java Room while we socialize and share Linux experiences. If you've been working on a Linux related project, feel free to share it with the group. New users: you are most welcome to attend! Bring your questions and try to stump the gurus.

Parking is *very* tight - please consider parking behind The Java Room in the parking lot for Center Sports. The lot is well lit, and there are stairs connecting it to the parking lot for The Java Room.

See ya there!

Andy
item.name: Linux @ The Java Room
